title: WOW something is up with my account
body:
So for some reason I cannot log into the game with my main account, yet I can log into the game with my smurf account. Never been punished by the league system, did not abandon games been playing since season 1. To make things more interesting, I can't even create a discussion or reply to threads with my main account. (But it works fine with my smurf account.) :(  Last time I logged in was only 2 weeks ago, please. I am really frustrated and do not want to start another main account again.

My router is properly port forwarded, DNS is set correctly, no anti-virus blocking it, same with no firewall blocking either. (Otherwise my smurf account would have the same issue)

Please help an old veteran. I have never had this issue and it will most likely make me quit the game if I can not log into my main account.

replies.body: What error are you seeing with the login? Have you tried resetting the password for the account, just in case?
